creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: large square rocks along shoreline with tall cliff at UR; thin grove of trees on outcropping at lower center next to low pavilion
inscription: ULC: [ 雲林画法　天保癸巳清和月倣於満山草堂 ] {Unrin Gaho  Tenpo Mizunoto Tsuchinoto Seiwa-zuki Manzan Sodo ni oite narau} (Painted in the manner of Ni Tsan in the Seiwa month of the Tenpo Mizunoto Tsuchinoto year at a thatched hut on Mt. Man.)
markings: ULC: [ 成昌 ] (Seisho no in); [ 字伯明 ] (Azuna hakumei); LRC; black vinyl label R roller end: [Ckikuto/ Ni]; black vinyl label L roller end: [Chikuto / Ni]
medium: Ink and white paint on paper
title: Winter Landscape in the Manner of Ni Zan
